item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Agreed. It's just that for newer players who are relying on the answer keys, it could get frustrating or confusing if the answer key is wrong or has the wrong diagram. Otherwise, I think the solutions they provided are spot on for the most part.
item.content:encoded: Agreed. It’s just that for newer players who are relying on the answer keys, it could get frustrating or confusing if the answer key is wrong or has the wrong diagram. Otherwise, I think the solutions they provided are spot on for the most part.

item.title: By: Matthew Donadio
item.dc:creator: Matthew Donadio
item.description: I contacted Baduktopia a few months ago about the answer keys. The keys are for the first edition, while most (all?) of the books are in second edition now. They editions are nearly identical, but there are a few mistakes here and there, and a few problems have changed. The differences haven't been big enough to prevent the answer keys from being useful.
item.content:encoded: I contacted Baduktopia a few months ago about the answer keys. The keys are for the first edition, while most (all?) of the books are in second edition now. They editions are nearly identical, but there are a few mistakes here and there, and a few problems have changed. The differences haven’t been big enough to prevent the answer keys from being useful.
